name: Omega No Sunshine Day one edition
name_original: Omega No Sunshine Day one edition
description:
What is Omega No Sunshine ?

Omega no sunshine is an arcade video game,you are a character that is welcome,in a world that could end without your little help.

Bring back the sun seed,and your world will be saved

this game is available in FRENCH and ENGLISH 

it is also playable with a controler (as xbox or playstation or whatever is your controler)

it have like 4hours of game time, and it will increase in 2020 through two major update !

How can i have it,how much it cost ?

this video game is available thanks to an order system available on our official video game website,you'll find everything here :

https://oon597.wixsite.com/omeganosunshine

it cost 18$ it is for the day one edition,and,of course, for the two major update of 2020

By who it was made ?

it was made by the Galoxyum studio and now,by us ,C0sm0S,

we are a team of only two people,we work more than 65 hours per week

and made christmas day verifying the smallest details to deliver you the best of us day one.hope you'll love it

How can we contact you ?

we are ever available at c0sm0s@asia.com

and we really love to chat with our players,so you are welcome =D

ENGLISH + FRENCHCONTROLER4H GAME TIMEPC- windows283Mo2 UPDATE PLANNED (3H each)
